title: Oil Holds Two-Day Advance as Traders Focus on Middle East Risks
description: Oil held a two-day advance as rising tensions in the Middle East centered on OPEC member Iran added a risk premium to prices.
content: Oil held a two-day advance as rising tensions in the Middle East centered on OPEC member Iran added a risk premium to prices.
